entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is worried about being the worst in his class.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend, who is also a student at Hogwarts. He brought sandwiches for breakfast.

relationships.description: Harry and Ron are friends, as they are both students at Hogwarts and have a conversation on the train.
